incentives.description: 10% retention released upon meeting 99% accessibility compliance score (WCAG 2.2 AA)

clauses.text: Agency shall have fifteen (15) business days to review and accept each deliverable; lack of written rejection constitutes deemed acceptance.

playbook.fallback: Extend review window to 30 business days with automatic timeline extension upon rejection.

clauses.text: Vendor agrees to liquidated damages of $5,000 per business day for delays exceeding ten (10) days beyond the agreed milestone delivery date.

playbook.fallback: Cap damages at 15% of milestone value and introduce cure period before assessment.

clauses.text: All software deliverables must comply with the California Open Data Policy and be released under permissive open source licenses unless exempted in writing.

playbook.fallback: Allow proprietary components with security review and escrow requirement.

risks.signal: Review period shorter than state procurement benchmark (20 business days).
risks.recommendation: Negotiate 30-day review with iterative feedback rights.

risks.signal: Per-day damages uncapped and exceed 20% margin at 30-day delay.
risks.recommendation: Introduce cap tied to milestone value and cure process.

obligations.description: Provide timely access to legacy system SMEs and staging environments.
Submit monthly project status reports including earned value metrics and risk register.

playbook.target: Cap at 10% of milestone with 7-day cure
